prompt: <description>**Part 1: A Three-Dimensional Rectangular Prism with a Slightly Tapered Top** **Step 1: Create the Coordinate System** * Define the Euler Angles as [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Define the Translation Vector as [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] **Step 2: Draw the 2D Sketch on the Plane Defined by the Coordinate System** * Create a new face (face\\_1) * Draw the first line (line\\_1) with a Start Point at [0.0, 0.5] and an End Point at [0.125, 0.5] * Draw the second line (line\\_2) with a Start Point at [0.125, 0.5] and an End Point at [0.125, 0.0] * Draw the third line (line\\_3) with a Start Point at [0.125, 0.0] and an End Point at [0.375, 0.0] * Draw the fourth line (line\\_4) with a Start Point at [0.375, 0.0] and an End Point at [0.375, 0.5] * Draw the fifth line (line\\_5) with a Start Point at [0.375, 0.5] and an End Point at [0.5, 0.5] * Draw the sixth line (line\\_6) with a Start Point at [0.5, 0.5] and an End Point at [0.5, 0.75] * Draw the seventh line (line\\_7) with a Start Point at [0.5, 0.75] and an End Point at [0.0, 0.75] * Draw the eighth line (line\\_8) with a Start Point at [0.0, 0.75] and an End Point at [0.0, 0.5] **Step 3: Scale the 2D Sketch** * Apply a scaling factor of 0.75 to the sketch **Step 4: Transform the Scaled 2D Sketch into 3D Sketch** * Define the extrude depth towards the normal as 0.5 units * Define the extrude depth opposite the normal as 0 units * Define the sketch scale as 0.75 * Perform a "New Body Feature Operation" to create a new solid body **Shape Description** * The shape of the part is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top * The length of the part is 0.75 units * The width of the part is 0.75 units * The height of the part is 0.5 units</description>
completion:

</json>
